Ritual.ab: Cf. N52.9 (cf. Kotwal and Kreyenbroek, 2003: p. 238-9; Cantera, 2014: p. 228 f.)
tā ō ẏāiš azāθā mahmāi x́iiātā auuaŋᵛhē .. mat̰ vā̊ padāiš *ẏā *frasrūtā īzaiiā̊ pairi.jasāi 6 gōwišn u-š sē gām 'az kust ī hōy pad sar ī barsom be āyišn

He has to recite the six stanzas including (VrS88.3-8, Y64.3-8=Y50.6-11) ẏāiš azāθā mahmāi x́iiātā auuaŋᵛhē (VrS88.4, Y64.4=Y50.8)... mat̰ vā̊ padāiš *ẏā *frasrūtā īzaiiā̊ pairi.jasāi(VrS88.5, Y64.5 =Y50.8)and he has to go three paces from the left side to the top of the barsom.
